title: Ip Is Same?!
body: I played Like 3 to 4 games and my Ip didint change at all (exm: 1108 Ip I have now Last Game I got about 200 and When it Ended the game my ip didint change I Think thats because the store is not yet out :\) sorry for bad english

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=RengarGaming1,realm=EUNE,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=FQJA7Jlc,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-12T23:36:48.189+0000)
>
> ...thats because the store is not yet out...

correct, but you are still getting all of your rewards ;D

It takes time for it to show your updated IP as it's all SERVER BASED!

This happens with EVERYONE on the Alpha, it's not a big deal, AT ALL.

Yes, I get this problem too and it seems common. Resetting the client probably updates it until you earn or spend more. We have the IP but it isn't updated and yeah I heard something about it getting fixed when the store is ready, or something. I'm sure it will be fixed.
